title: Veritas et Fortitudo v1.2.0 - Europa Universalis IV mod
description:
Veritas et Fortitudo v1.2.0 - Europa Universalis IV mod

Extract 7zip to your C:Users[user]Documents Paradox Interactive Europa Universalis IV mod folder


COMPATIBLE WITH EUIV 1.7 and Res Publica! 

1.2.0 [2014-08-15] - Comaptible with v1.7/Res Publica 

As announced in advance, this version is not save game compatible with previous versions. 

Veritas et Fortitudo, the successor to the popular "Glory of Byzantium" mod offers significantly extended gameplay in both historical and alternate history modes on a new map with breathtaking scope. 

New Features
New Map and over a 100 new countries, including females such as the Celtic & Angevin Empires 
Significant reduction in download size through optimization of graphics files (70MB smaller) 
Stability System 
Vassal System 
Research System 
Aristocratic Power System 
Administrativ Capacity System (rulers and provinces) 
New Hanseatic League System 
Updated User Interface including many new icons 
Colorful Event Pictures 
Nation Specific factions for Great Britain, Byzantium, Persia, Russia, Japan and the Angevin Empire 
New religions, including Pagan religions such as Romuva, and religious minorities in provinces 
Nearly 100 Great Historical Persons available as Advisors and new portraits for all advisors 
48 available Trade Goods 
New music, including original works 
Provincial Government system 
New government types for Archbishops, Counts, Dukes and others 
Modernisation system to replace the Westernization mechanic 
Numerous new policies to customize your realm 
Horde Raids and a Tribute system

New Content
The Black Death 
The Hundred Years War 
The Spanish Inquisition 
The War of the Roses 
The Reformation

Revised Features
Complete overhaul of Idea Groups 
Complete overhaul of Military Units 
Complete overhaul of the Papacy 
Complete overhaul of Buildings, including new icons 
Map shaders 
Plus thousands of events, missions and decisions.

Content Graciously Shared From Other Mods
Serenissima Italia 
Scandinavian Flavour 
Hordes Unlimited 
Better Diplomacy Mod (Add-On) 
More Provinces Mod
